rex_anchor2.name: Anchor ratio
rex_anchor2.description: Position objects relative to the size of the window.

horizontal-align-mode.name: Horizontal align mode
horizontal-align-mode.desc: Anchor the object's left edge to window horizontal position.

horizontal-position.name: Horizontal position
horizontal-position.desc: Horizontal position of window, 0 - 1, 0 = window left, 0.5 = window center, 1 = window right.

vertical-align-mode.name: Vertical align mode
vertical-align-mode.desc: Anchor the object's left edge to window vertical position.

vertical-position.name: Vertical position
vertical-position.desc: Vertical position of window, 0 - 1, 0 = window top, 0.5 = window center, 1 = window bottom.

Ä±nitial-state.name: Initial state
Ä±nitial-state.desc: Whether to initially have the behavior enabled or disabled.

set-once.name: Set once
set-once.desc: Enable to set position once when window size changed.

state2.name: State
state2.desc: Whether to enable or disable the behavior.

position0.name: Position
position0.desc: position of window, 0 - 1, 0 = window left, 0.5 = window center, 1 = window right.

position0.name: Position
position0.desc: position of window, 0 - 1, 0 = window top, 0.5 = window center, 1 = window bottom.
